column4: I am not sure what I did, but double click no longer executes in programs. So, for example, in Eclipse if I double click a file in the browser, nothing happens. I have to right click and open
Or in Pidgin or Empathy if I double click a contact, nothing happens, I have to right click and click on IM or chat
have you tried a different mouse?
don't have a mouse. its a touchpad. and single click is fine.
